Name: CLK_DIV
Description: Number of system clock cycles per half SCLK period - 1

Name: PRE_WAIT
Description: Number of system clock cycles between the falling edge of SS_N and first SCLK edge - 1. a.k.a DCNVSCKL

Name: POST_WAIT
Description: Number of system clock cycles between the last rising edge of SCLK and the rising edge of SS_N - 1. a.k.a DSCKLCNVH
